Welcome to the 99 Software Foundation!

The 99 Software Foundation is a small community focused on all aspects of reusable Java components.

Our vision is composed of four parts:

  • Apache Maven Plugins - plugins for our preferred build rich client, Apache Maven.
  • The common tools - A collection of reusable Java components.
  • Google Guice Integrations - A set of extensions for our preferred DI framework, Google Guice.
  • Semantic Web - A series of lightweight yet powerful tools for the Semantic Web.
